content.detailedDescription: Was leaving a friend's house this evening at about 5:22 pm.  we were in the front yard facing the west.  my roommate noticed four objects high in the sky, and they moved, nearly overhead.  at first i thought they were planes, but they remained equidistant from one-another, and moved in a single file.  they did not have lights like an airplane, nor could i discern any shape, just that they had brighter-than-starlight flashes of light that seemed to flicker yellow/orange.  they moved west to east, and we observed them for several minutes.  the neighbors pulled in a few doors down, and exclaimed at seeing them, as well.  they had been tracking them on the drive home.  the objects seemed to disappear one by one, one was still barely visible behind a cloud when i got into the car.  we could no longer see them when i drove away at 5:27.  the objects moved fairly steadily, similar to planes moving at a high altitude.
content.summary: Four flashing lights in the sky, equidistant to one another, on allentown/ bethlehem border

content.detailedDescription: So i was a teenager when this happened and i didn't know there was a place to report  things like this until just now. i was in my bedroom on the second floor, my bed faced the window. the window faced the back yard of my property which was full of tall trees and very woodsy. anyway all of a sudden i was awake for some reason, i had this really paranoid feeling like something was watching me. i lied in bed very still to see if the feeling would pass but it kept getting stronger. after a while of this, there we three flashes of light that came from my eye level (on the second floor) from one of the trees closest to my window. it was almost like someone was sitting in the tree taking pictures of my through my second story window, but the flashes were too large to be from a camera. i was terrified ( and just a kid) so i didn't really move but i watched that tree like a hawk until the morning and nobody and no thing ever came down out of it ( like how you would see tree branches move when somebody is climbing a tree, that never happened in fact the tree never moved at all). also there was absolute silence this entire time, cameras at that time would have made a very loud noise especially for a flash that large and bright .  i didn't ever really see an object i just saw those three flashes, so there was really no "losing sight of the object." the next day, after staying up all night and being just a kid, i just chalked it up to some weird occurrence and i thought maybe my imagination was running wild because i was only like 12-13, i thought maybe i would get an explanation as time went on. but the older i got the more i realized that event was totally unexplainable and seriously disturbing.
content.summary: Saw flashes through my bedroom window around 2 am

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside with my mom looking toward the eastern sky. she made a statement about ufos because she saw a plane nearby. i said how ufos and taking about them kind of spooked me. i was looking to the sky and saw one light moving. i thought that it was a satellite. it was too bright to be a satellite, though. then i looked a little bit down from the one light and saw the other two lights moving with the first, forming a triangle. it was moving slowly from nearly due east to east-south-east and a little downwards in the sky. as it moved, the lights began to fade. at no point was i able to see the body of the object. i was very afraid as i had never to that point seen a ufo, and am still very confused as to what i saw. i lost sight of the object once its lights faded away. i didn't do anything other than go get my dad from inside, but the object was gone by the time we got back outside.
content.summary: Triangular, only lights on points visible, slow moving

content.detailedDescription:
1. while sitting in my back yard gazing into the sky i saw something from my peripheral vision moving from the west to the east. 

from the moment i saw it, i counted (one one thousand) 8 seconds till it disappeared from view going in what appeared to be an upward trajectory, about 45 degree from the eastern horizon, it changed direction and headed in a slight east to north path.

at first i thought it was a star, but it was moving. too fast for a plane.

it flew in a straight line from west to east, it appeared to be a light, from my vantage it looked like a star at first.

i became excited and started to yell for my wife to come out and see it. but she came out too late.

i lost sight of the object when it turned north and looked like it went up until it was too far to see. 

it is a very clear night. please don't think i'm some kind of person with mental issues. i don't know why i saw it or them, not sure if it was two and one split off from the other. this is not the first time i have seen something like this. i have some video of one i saw about 3 years ago too.
content.summary: At 18:13pm i saw a star like light fly from the west to east then east/north.

content.detailedDescription: I am a cook supervisor at the enterprise health and rehabilitation clinic, at 2045, i was taking out the trash at the rear of the facility when i noticed three red stars in a "v" formation moving from my right to my left, then i witnessed two more formations followed by a single star. they moved very casually, like a boat on a calm water, there was no noise, not even barking. when they came to the area above the escc baseball field, they moved into a circle formation and just as the tenth star approached, they went dark and were gone .
content.summary: Nine star shaped objects in three "v" formations travelled casually with one following. when they came to a spot above the escc baseball field they hovered and when the last star came close they all went dark and they were gone .

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside having a cigarette i was hearing a low hum i started looking around to see if i could identify the source then noticed the tree in my front yard which is about 50 to 60 feet tall did not have any light coming trough its branches as soon as i noticed it it vanished in a flash of light and light from the neighbors across the street's front porch returned through the branches what ever it was did not have any lights on it it was just an enormous black mass  .
content.summary: Large craft seen through the trees

content.detailedDescription:
On 12/23/2013 at about 8:30 - 9 pm i stepped outside of my apartment for a cigarette. i noticed it was a cloudy night with very little could break. as i went to sit down on the patio chair i noticed a bright star to the sw of my location. i then though to myself it is a cloudy night and i shouldnt be seeing a star. now i live about 25 miles from pittsburgh international airport, so my second though was that it was headlights from a low flying airplane. i continued to observer the object and it was not a airplane. it was stationary and looked just like a star sitting there illuminating. after observing the ufo for about 10 minutes i herd a helicopter coming from the ne. it was dark out so as the helicopter passed over heading in the direction of the ufo i could not see the color of the helicopter. as i turned my attention back to the ufo it disappeared right before my eyes. just like someone flipped a switch on a light (gone). at this point i knew what i had seen was a ufo. since this sighting i was curious if anyone else in the area had seen the same ufo. i researched the internet and found that someone on youtube has been recording the same star like ufo. the youtube posters location is sw of my location the same direction i observed the ufo on 12/23. i am certain the ufo video he has recorded from 12/22/2013 was what i seen on 12/23/2013 in the video it looks like a airplane at first but then it stops hovers and then brightens then disappears. this video was not recorded by me but the poster lives 13 miles from my location. poster has a lot of ufo footage from this area for this month. i will also be working on trying to get a recording of the ufo myself as it seems to be a hotspot right now.  

here is the video link

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Star like ufo (pittsburgh) area

content.detailedDescription:
It was 12:12am and my wife and i were walking home from a christmas eve party.  the sky was very clear and i was looking up at the stars when i noticed a light back over my shoulder.  it was maybe four times bigger than jupiter or venus in the sky.  my first thought was that it was an airplane, but it was moving way too fast.  i called my wife's attention to it and she saw it too.  it was difficult to estimate the altitude, but i would guess it was somewhat lower than where the airliner's fly, but it was moving so fast i kept thinking it was must have been lower to move across the sky like that.  the light was a pale yellow, almost white and it had an irregularity to the way the light looked.  the edges looked indistinct.  it wasn't pulsating, just irregular.  i made an effort to see if there were any blinking lights as they are required on aircraft and there were none.  the whole observation lasted about 7 seconds and then it was gone behind some trees.  from my viewpoint, it covered a 90 degree arc across the sky.

i would guess it was going 3 to 4 times faster than a airliner, 1500mi/hr or so.

i then started trying to figure out what it was or wasn't:
1) meteor - no trail, no sparks and flew level, it wasn't coming down.  also too slow for a meteor.
2) plane - too fast and no blinking lights.  perhaps a jet fighter flying low could have appeared to go that fast, but it would have made a lot of noise and this made none.  and i've never seen a plane put out that kind of light.
3)and it wasn't santa or rudolf!  reindeer can fly that fast!  truly, i did think of that in the moment, but this is no joke, this happened.
content.summary: White to yellow light,  moving too fast for a plane, silent

content.detailedDescription: Look over my right shoulder just above the propane tank and to the right of the telephone pole.  i've enlarged in on my computer and it looks like a cigar with flames coming out the back.  i'd never noticed it till i enlarged the photo.
content.summary: See in a picture taken in my front yard

content.detailedDescription: My name is andrew, and i am from romania 3 years working on a farm in my native village at around 1:30 2:30 appeared in the sky a bright light so i knew after an hour aprocsimativ mother woke up in another part of the farm bloody nose and standing with several scars when i have sleep and do not know what happens to me i want you to help me or to see what happens to me thank you for understanding not wait to contact me
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription:
This is not a ufo report. but i believe is an important idea, never listen before.
i red more book about ufo and seeing almost all tv series about ufo phenomenon on tv in last 30 years. in this evening a 2 hours series run on discovery science here in ro. first hour was new episode. second hours was seen on main discovery channel with one mouth ago. 
is about abducted people. i seen and i read enough cases to find an strange thing. all families who are abducted lived in houses. in houses made by wood or others soft materials. none of these families not living in multi-floors housing blocks. also they not living in large cities. even known and implanted abducted who run to hide in towns, go live in houses, not flat-blocks made by concrete and steel. and in these series, a woman and his daughter was effectively put to run outside town with his car to can be abduct!. 
please do a research about this. if really is as i feel, please tell this to person who was abducted and was enough frightened to leave their house and move elsewhere. on housing blocks made by concrete and steel is some lower comfort and some lower intimacy, but in this kind of humans cluster, et cannot came and also they cannot abduct people. 
also , please inform me about your research.
content.summary: Are multi-flat blocks housing made by steel and concrete an shield against alien abduct ?

content.detailedDescription: It was 23:55 pm, and i was sitting, playing a game on my computer. a couple of minutes later, i wanted to go and take a drink, but before i left my room, i saw a huge, red glowing circle above another building out of my window. it was very fast. probably faster than anything on earth. i couldn't believe what i saw, and i can't believe that i actually saw it, since it was amazingly fast. i'm pretty sure its not something from earth. note: duration of the event was 3 seconds to 5 seconds. the red glowing circle was above the builsing , floating, and then it disappeared, at very fast speed.
content.summary: The thing that i saw, was a huge, red glowing circle. it was very fast. i'm pretty sure that something faster than that hasn't been invented yet (on earth).

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard having just finished some gardening, facing the hills (east), my back to the setting sun (west).  i looked up at the sky after i turned the garden hose off and noticed a star directly up and ahead.  no other stars were out yet, so i wondered if it was a very high plane glinting with sunlight.  but it really looked like a star, or possibly venus, though i had never seen venus at that location in the sky before. something about it just seemed odd, unusual, and i wanted to look at it with binoculars. i like to watch airplanes, stars, and meteor showers but i usually only use my binoculars to observe birds. i watched it for several minutes, and realized it wasn't moving.  the feeling that it was odd remained. i do not normally have this feeling about stars.  i decided to get binoculars and then come back to my same position to see if it had moved.  i marked my position on the stepping stone i was standing on, and made an estimated 'triangulation' between where the star was and the line of my roof and the gutter.  i then noticed a small plane leaving a vapor trail flying low overhead, from where i was still standing.  i walked around the side of my house and indoors to get my binoculars. this must have taken only about 10-15 seconds.  the vapor-trail plane had advanced considerably and i watched it from near my patio door as it receded towards the hills (east). this probably took about another 15-20 seconds.

 i then walked back down the side of the house to the hose faucet. glancing up, i saw the star still there.  i observed my position and guessed that it hadn't moved at all, and if it had, it was a nearly imperceptible movement.  at this point i no longer thought it was a plane, and thought it was perhaps too low to be a satellite.  there were still no other stars out that i could see.  i looked at it with binoculars, but it was difficult to get a lot of detail.  it was shining with a whitish-silver light, and i could see a general form to it- it was round and a clump-shape, rather than an elongated one.   i could not see anything that suggested wings like an airplane.  it also shimmered, similar to the way an oasis does. because there was a shape to it rather than just light, i now had the impression that i was looking at some kind of object.  i tried to refocus the binoculars and glanced away for a second to ensure that i was still seeing it at the same point in the sky (i was). as i looked at it without binoculars, the light seemed to 'go out', and the object appeared as a dull gray point, as if darkened.  i immediately brought the binoculars up to my face, but i couldn't find it. i put the binoculars down again and scanned the sky, but i couldn't find it at all.  this was confusing because i had a good patch of sky visible and it seemed to literally have just vanished.  i changed my position, moved several times, and turned to face the other way in case it was visible from another angle.  the sky was still quite light out and airplanes were visible here and there (but still no other stars).  the star/object was gone.  this entire episode lasted roughly 5- 7 minutes or so.
content.summary: I observed a star while in my yard.  someting about it seemed odd.  no other stars were out, late afternoon. observed it with binoculars, then light aburptly went out, entire thing vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
I had to work late where i cleaned a salon in madison park. as i walked to the metro bus stop, i noticed it was a clear night, so i wanted to do a little star-gazing at the bus stop. you know how one shades the eyes on a sunny day to get a better look at something? well, i did something similar with my forearm and hand to block out a bit of street light. i identified orion in the south riding high and the pleiades was to the northwest. mildly satisfied with the view, i dropped my arm and looked to my left and saw there was another person waiting for the bus, too. i went back to my stargazing, but that's when i saw the brilliant yellowish light alternating to reddish-orange coming from the south at what seemed to be fairly low altitude. i said to the other person as i pointed at the object, "look, look! what's that?!" i had the presence of mind to take a 14 second video clip. all the while, the other witness and i debated what it could be: not an airplane or helocopter, not a metorite or cometary fragment, or any other space debris. there was no terrestrial running lights and no ionization trail. i suspected it was a ufo as soon as i saw it. the object didn't fly like anything i'd ever seen. i call it zipping along, the abrupt changing of directions. when i saw it, i had a mixture of fear and excitement because i actually saw something that i couldn't explain in the sky. i think about the event everyday, wondering what it was. i do not believe in ufo's because i've seen one!
lost sight of the object because it either zipped away at an incredible speed or it vanished. vanished more like it because it tended to dim to almost invisible at one point. i want to know more about what i witnessed. my outlook has changed quite alot since that night: not much bothers me anymore after witnessing a ufo. although, sometimes now i feel a lot of anxiety when i go outside and i'm constantly watching the sky.
content.summary: Flashing yellow-red-orange object appeared to be spherical and 'not moving right'. it would back up in path then go forward. appeared and disappeared at beginning and end of sighting.

content.detailedDescription: On christmas eve, 2013 at 10:30pm i was sitting in my van listening to the radio.  i had already gotten the presents out and i was smoking a cigarette listening to holiday music.  i saw a red dot out of the corner of my eye to the left... and as it rose it brighter red and then turned orange... it rose to about 2k feet and kept the same path to the north.. about 1 minute later the same thing... same everything... and another one came 1 minute after that one!!... i was like... damn .. i didn't even take one picture or nothing... no one will believe this sh@#... they all disappeared after they got far away..
content.summary: I saw three red balls turn orange and head north

content.detailedDescription: I was in my early teens and my friends and i were playing ball. a low flying v shaped craft flew tree top high right over us. its never been a thing until the last maybe 10 years that the memories have bothered me. i just thought you should know there is something there! i never understood why we never said anything , and i'm not sure there wasn't more. i just know what i saw.
content.summary: V shaped craft flew right over me and my friends

content.detailedDescription:
It happened many years ago when i was about 10 or 11 years old. it was nice whether. i went to my friends house. we all went outside to ride our bikes. this was a populated neighborhood with flat streets in tarzana ca. for riding bikes and not much car traffic. there was a long driveway with a graduated slant up, that we could all get our bikes up to the top and then turn around to ride down with some speed and when you get to the bottom where the drivway meets the street you have to go right or left so we always went right and raced each other down the driveway then right down the street back to her house..Just a normal playing on an average day, nothing was different until i decided to go up the driveway one more time by myself for one more ride, as soon as i got to the top i noticed what i thought was kid riding a bike from the main part of the property that was wooded, seemed broken down and deshoveled, you could not see in the area that he came from, like outta nowhere, so i stood there while he rode over to me, believe it or not he was on a boys bike with a sissy bar even, he was dressed in a red penalton shirt with jeans,i noticed he was not very well versed and very shaky on the bike and noticed he had very thin long feet, but as he got closer i saw his head size was hugh, his, what would be eyes were very large and black almond shaped taking up most of his face and up to his forhead, the whole face was like almond shaped. i cant remember a mouth or a nose or even ears, it was grayish white head and face, funny i do remember a hairline type black in color but not hair it was like smooth flush to the face and head, he had a very small frame extremly thin, but then when i looked at this fingers on the handlebars they were very long and thin and distorted not like ours even the hand part from the wrist was very elongated and were the same color as his head. the clothes he had on covered everything except his head and his hands the next thing you know he was face to face with me looking right at me and never looked away, never blinked and had a deadpan look while staring at me. i remember my thougts flooding in to make sence of what i was seeing yet the weird phsysical deformations were not like anything i had ever seen before,then i remember i was frozen, where i stood stradeling my bike, the reason i remember this is because i wanted to flee when i was terrified (kinda like when someone jumps out to scare you) that knee jurk reaction but absoultly i could not move or speak or even make a sound. then next thing i know i was able to break away, i jumped on my bike terrified rode as fast as i could back to my friends house where to my dismay all the kids were in house eating with the tv on and laying around the couch etc... i busted in the door wondering what everyone was doing in the house and eating and stuff we were just outside what happened to everyone, and did they see the freak boy. everyone looked at me like i was crazy and to quit trying to scare them. they all looked at me like i was crazy and said they all thought i went home because they did not see me and that they had been in the house for a long time and were tired of playing, i remeber i could not believe it i was very confused and i do remember feeling sorta like the odd man out all the sudden like i had done something wrong, so i left and rode my bike home, then i had to ride past that driveway and was so terrified i could barley compose myself to get home. that driveway has burned in my memory to this day i can barley drive by it i shutter everytime i go by it as an adult!
the only other thing i have ever happened to me is one night in the wee hous of driving back to la about 8 years ago in the desert in victorville i was the only one on the road when outta the blue in my rear view blinding bright lights white, red and blue caught my eyes speeding super fast and swooping down on the back of my car, i almost crashed trying to get outta the way, cause at first i thought it was the cops cause i was speeding but it all happened so fast and the lights covered a hugh area, there was no sound. i had no idea what the hell was happening, then that fast they were gone. it freaked me out cause there was no one there, gone as fast as it came.
content.summary: Came face to face with small human type

content.detailedDescription: Estava de bicicleta ������ ������ minha direita estava v������rias nuvens (c������mulos) e, chamou minha aten������������o um objeto branco (como uma p������rola ofuscada) que pareceu sair e entrar de uma dos c������mulos. n������o acredito ser um avi������o....Pela maneira que ele entrou e saiu da nuvem, muito r������pido, al������m de ter um porte grande para um avi������o que estava naquela altura.

content.detailedDescription:
1. first stroll around se eindhoven (i'd gone to meet someone i'd met on the internet).

2. detailed examination of my photos on return to australia - i routinely check and try enlarging/cropping all my photos to see if they can be improved.

3. flying saucer, but i'd never seen one like this seeming to trail black smoke before.

4. because it is a much-later discovered image, i can't give you any info on its movements.

5. i thought, "oh wow, is that a ufo?" the more i looked, the more it seemed to be; but i did also think: "is that a bug that has somehow turned out like a ufo??" - but that seems a long shot.

6. as stated earlier, i only discovered this object upon playing with my photos. no 'photo-shopping' of any kind has been done. all that i ever do is to crop and/or blow up my photos.
content.summary: Found this on digital camera photo about 4 weeks after the event.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from work on lewis center road i witnessed flash of light streak across sky at high speed traveling north to south west at extremely high rate of speed. crossed my entire windshield in a matter of a few seconds. neighbor reported blue orb in backyard that shot into sky at high rate of speed around the same time as this sighting. object was extremely bright white lite that i witnessed that moved faster than shooting star but streaked across the horizon and did not burn out.
content.summary: Arrow shaped flash of light that crossed skyline in seconds. bright white lite. blue orb seen by neighbor in backyard streaking towrards sky in the same month as well as  white orb shooting from ground to sky in same month 5 miles south of my sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
On the 24th of december 2013 at approximately 1:00am i went outside to pet my dog and gaze up at the stars as it was a beautiful, clear night. i live in a rural farming area in ohio. i noticed what appeared to be a star towards the west approximately 30 degrees above the horizon. upon further observation there was something funny about this "star" because for one, it was fairly low on the horizon and two, it seemed to be "twinkling" more aggressively than your average star. a few moments later i noticed that it was moving so my initial thought was that it was a plane. however, as this though was quickly discredited as the object began to move in the opposite direction from where it first moved. as i gazed at the object i was astonished to see it bob, weave, and zig-zag very slowly in random directions. the motion of the object was very fluid and smooth, a lot like a fishing bobber floating in rippling water. i was astounded by this object because i look at the stars every night and i have never seen anything as bizarre as this. i was so fixated on this object and the way it smoothly maneuvered, that it had me in sort of a trance-like state, comparative to gazing into a fire at night. this object hovered in the same general area in the sky, like it had it's own section to dance in. throughout the entire sighting this object would slowly change in brightness. like a stove that gradually gets warm, the object would slowly get bright, then slowly get dim, almost to the point where you couldn't see it, only to gradually get brighter again. the brightening and dimming was seemingly random and not timed. about a half hour into the sighting the object moved left out of my view behind a tree, so i moved to the right where i could see it. as soon as i got a good view of it again, another star-like object appeared to drop out of the other one, hover below it for a few seconds, and then dim out to nothing. after this occurred the object returned to its original designated position in the sky. i was so perplexed and fixated on this object that when i finally broke sight with it i realized that there were approximately 10 other star-like objects towards the west, making the same maneuvers, all relatively low on the horizon (between 25 and 60 degrees), and all bobbing around without moving too far away from where they started. i watched these objects until heavy cloud cover blocked them from my sight around 3:30 in the morning. 

on christmas day when i returned home from family festivities at around 7:00 pm, i got out of my car and looked back in the general area of my sighting the previous morning. it was much cloudier and i wasn't expecting to see anything but to my amazement i see one of the objects again towards the west but a bit lower, just above the horizon, making the exact same movements. i only saw one object on the 25th but it was there, bobbing and weaving, until i went to bed around 10 (i didn't get much sleep the night before because of these things). i felt compelled to submit this review tonight because this is an ongoing sighting and as i type, there is one light still bobbing around towards the west in the same general area it was in the night before on christmas day. approximately 4 hours ago around 8:00 pm on the 26th, i went outside to look at the light again and there was another one next to it. i watched the other one for a couple seconds until it did something i never saw any of the other lights do. it took off towards the south very fast and out of view. i was astonished by what i saw. 

a couple of interesting things that i wanted to point out in conclusion. i know this may sound crazy but the first light that i observed on the 24th seemed to be aware of me viewing it. i found it rather bizarre how it went behind the tree, away from my view, only to spawn the other one that disappeared within seconds. and whenever i moved to the left so the object would just barely be hidden behind the tree from my view, sometimes it seemed to move to the right, back into my view in a sort of "i still see you" like fashion. this could all, however, be a coincidence with it's random movements. another thing i noticed on the 24th, is that my dog was whimpering on and off for about an hour through the first sighting. he barks a lot but rarely whimpers and i found that a bit odd. the last thing that i wanted to point out is that these objects made me feel a little uncomfortable and there was something a bit sinister about them. i am completely perplexed by what i have been seeing the past three nights and cannot think of a logical explanation for it.
content.summary: Watched a moving star-like object that would slowly bob, weave, and zig-zag in the same general area.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my home when i saw a flash and a loud boom towards the east, the same exact thing occurred earlier today about 12pm and also about a week ago at approx 3am.  wondering whats behind these bright flashes and booms
content.summary: Bright flash followed by boom

content.detailedDescription: While watching tv i noticed two orange star like objects flying very close to each other when i looked out my bedroom window. i ran downstairs and grabbed my wife and we watched the two lights coming up from the south. the two objects appeared to make a stop then they disappeared. about 30 seconds later they reappeared in the same place (about 2 - 3 miles south) as i initially saw them. the objects had no sound as they flew and they repeated the same flight pattern then disappeared. again they reappeared and this time there was three of them. it was a very weird experience.
content.summary: 2 then 3 orange orbs appeared

content.detailedDescription: Traveling west on u.S. 41 just passing the small town if ishpeming. the owner of the company i work for and myself were heading to our 2nd job of the evening. we had just stopped at a red light (intersection 2nd street and u.S. 41) and were proceeding west. i looked up to see a large "fireball" coming in from the south and streaking across the sky from about the 10 o'clock position and ending at about the 5 o'clock position above the tree line. it lasted about 4 or 5 seconds at most. i pointed it out immediately to john (he was driving) and we both were quite amazed by it.  it had a tail that stretched across the sky. the fireball itself was emitting sparks and flames eventually either burning out or we lost sight of it as it fell behind the treeline. it is hard to say how far away it was but having seen airplanes coming in for a landing with their landing lights on as far away as the keewanaw peninsula over lake superior... which is at least 50 miles... this object seemed closer than that. but as i said there was no reference for distance. it had to be quite large as it was very bright.  neither of us had ever seen anything quite like it in person. although, i have seen videos of similar fireballs.
content.summary: A "fireball" streaked across the sky from south to north finally burning out above the tree line

content.detailedDescription: Looked like stationary non blinking red lights, two of them hovering close to each other and then travelling due west.  it was somewhat like two planes, but they were close and not blinking and the lights were only red.  i was outside having a cigarette when i spotted them and called my daughter out.  she also witnessed them.  it lasted about one minute or less then faded.
content.summary: Looked like stationary non blinking red lights, two of them hovering close to each other and then travelling due west

content.detailedDescription:
It was the day after christmas and the dark night had fallen as i was strolling down my street and arriving in front of my house at the very end of my daily exercise walk. my house lies near the top of a hill and i'm facing northeast with an unobstructed view of the sky above richmond, virginia.

suddenly, i see a glowing object approximately 45 degrees above the horizon and descending from south-to-north at an approximate 70-degree angle of trajectory.

what first caught my eye and got my attention was the object's extreme speed, much faster than a manmade airplane!  my brain first thought "meteorite" but as i continued to watch i quickly dismissed the "meteorite" theory because the ufo's size, shape, and color were totally inconsistent with all of the meteorites that i've evern seen during my nearly 54 years on this planet.

the ufo had a whitish-orange glow, but solid with no tail, it appeared to be at least three to four times larger than the usual meteorite, and the ufo appeared to be disc or oval shaped.

by this point, my mind definitely had switched to the "extraterrestrial vehicle" hypothesis and as i really began to focus my consciousness on the object the ufo suddenly blinked out and disappeared from view, leaving me with the impression that the e.T. pilots telepathically "knew" that they were under surveillance by someone on the ground.

i immediately checked my cell phone for the time (6:14 p.M. est) and took mental note of the direction, distance (1-2 miles away) altitude (300-400 feet), and heading of the ufo that i had just seen.  then rather than going directly into my house i opted to stand in the street for another couple of more minutes scanning the heavens in hopes of getting another glimpse of an e.T. craft.

note:  i have noticed how other independent eyewitnesses in the greater richmond area have submitted at least four other ufo reports to mufon this month, including a report where someone videoed a large glowing ufo sphere (orb) that was hovering and maneuvering silently over pocahontas state park on dec. 2, 2013 (mufon case 52571).  furthermore, a friend of mine who lives in a community behind the park had a helicopter hovering and flying low over his house and neighborhood (very unusual) in the same general time frame.  in addition, another friend of mine in the same county photographed several heavily-armed ah-64 apache attack helicopters flying in battle formation extremely low over a nearby church, and the choppers were coming from the direction of pocahontas state park and heading northwest toward the city of richmond.  the apaches were seen at 6:02 p.M. during rush hour on a friday.  these choppers were very unusual for this area and we believe they may have been hunting or monitoring ufos.  last but not least and for the record, the national ufo reporting center (nuforc) has been inundated recently with an historically high number of ufo reports with many witnesses across the u.S. and canada reporting silent orange ufo spheres and orbs.
content.summary: Silent glowing orange/white ufo disc/oval seen descending at extremely-high speed over richmond, va the night after christmas

content.detailedDescription:
Rapid descent of triangle shaped object.   leaving a trail of green and then red til it appeared to land at a distance.   zero sound.   initially appeared to be a meteor or similar, due to the advanced speed of the objects descent.

i was on a farm, doing evening chores.   in looking up at the motion and color, i followed the path.   time it took was under 30 seconds.   i lost sight of the object when it appeared to land as it disappeared under tree lines.   it is presumed the object would have been 4 to 5 miles north of my location.

nothing i have seen in aircraft moves at the speed that this object moved.
content.summary: Meteor like in speed and color trails

content.detailedDescription: 3 bright neon green orbs flew by at incredible speed - was not lightning or plane. happened very fast.
content.summary: 3 unidentified objects seen

content.detailedDescription: On 21 december 2013 i went outside to light the grill.Afterwords i sat down and looked at the sky as i usually do.I saw at 90 degrees stright up what appeared to be a bright star.As i watched i realized it was to early for stars to be visible as venus was not yet visable.After about one minute thirty seconds the starlight appearance disapeared leavind an odject visable.After about thirty seconds the object just vanished.After a minute or so i went inside to check the time and grab my 20x50 power boniculars.I scaned the sky for ten minutes and saw no trace of it.It was between 5.30 and 5.35p.M.Arizona time,the sun had just set.Venus was not visable untill 5.43p.M. at 30 degrees in the southern sky and no other stars were visable untill 6.03 to the north.
content.summary: A starlight light,the light disapeared revealing an object then it to disapeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on the way to work along highway 14 and was about an eighth of a mile north of the road that leads to the santa fe county adult correctional facility. i noticed something bright in the corner of the windshield and focused on it. it was a hovering reflective or otherwise bright thing hanging in the air at least 600 feet above the ground at least a half mile directly south of the correctional facility.
my initial impression was that it was an airplane. but it was not moving at any noticeable difference with respect to the ground. plus, there were no contrails behind it, and it would have been flying too low for a commercial jet. my next thought was that it was a star. but it was clearly daytime, no other stars were apparent.
as these thoughts were occurring, the object remained hanging in the air, and i kept driving, hopefully to get a better look. my internal monologue was a plea to the craft to let me know it better, but to no avail. after approximately 10 seconds, it vanished without movement in the span of 3 seconds. no objects obscured it, as i had been driving down the same straight stretch of highway the entire time. the only possible explanation for the fading of the object was either it moving directly away from me or it somehow cloaked or otherwise became invisible. it might be some distant supernova, but after this testimony i will see if anything like that has happened while being visible in daylight.
afterwards i thought was that it was a reflection from dirt on my windshield. but as my car regularly shook and bounced the light remained steady, plus i was focusing through my windshield at the object.
i felt happy that i could witness such a bizarre event, but sad that i did not have a camera ready to witness the event. considering the object was just some extremely reflective, distant point in the sky, it isn't a huge loss.
content.summary: Witnessed odd reflective object in the sky
